title: The Christmas burglars
creator_credit: American Mutoscope and Biograph Company and D.W. Griffith
brief_description: Christmas morning brings an unexpected pleasant surprise for a desperate mother and her young daughter. Cast includes Florence Lawrence, Adele DeGarde, Charles Inslee, George Gebhardt, Mack Sennett, Harry Solter. Silent film with English intertitles.
creator_credit_for_label: American Mutoscope and Biograph Company and D.W. Griffith
